Function object for performing logical NOT (logical negation). Effectively calls {{c|operator!}} for type {{tt|T}}.

===Specializations===
{{rev begin}}
{{rev|since=c++14|
The standard library provides a specialization of {{tt|std::logical_not}} when {{tt|T}} is not specified, which leaves the parameter types and return type to be deduced.
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/utility/functional/dsc logical_not_void}}
{{dsc end}}
}}
{{rev end}}
